name: Rally Car Racing
description:
Rally Car Racing

Use the range of cars available to climb over the daunting hills and maneuver through down the deep valleys. In this 2D Side-scroller you have the ability to choose from a range of cars and upgrades to try to overcome the challenging landscape. Collect coins along the way to upgrade and purchase new cars. 

How To Play:

Drive the car forward and reverse using the right and left arrows or A and D.

Control the car in the air using the forward and reverse keys also.
